server.name: Hosts
server.description: The static table lookup for host names

c:simple-property.name: lenses-path
c:simple-property.description: Full path to the augeas lenses directory. Example: /usr/local/share/augeas/lenses

c:simple-property.name: root-path
c:simple-property.description: Path from which augeas should begin to search for configuration files. Example: /

c:simple-property.name: augeas-hosts-path
c:simple-property.description: Augeas tree location of the hosts configuration values. Queries to augeas will append '/*' to the end of this value.

c:simple-property.name: ip
c:simple-property.description: IP address of the host entry.

c:simple-property.name: canonical
c:simple-property.description: Canonical name to refer to the IP
